EmailContent.subject: {CompanyName} Reconciliation Questions - {TodaysDate}
EmailContent.body:
Hi,

In order to streamline our communication, we send out this recurring email with a link to our CFO App. Here is the link:
Click here


This week we have {NotInBankUnreconciledItemsCount} unreconciled bank transactions.

Much thanks,
ProvenCFO
